title: Ambient display not working
content:
Since I updated my Pixel 3 XL to Android 10 in October the Ambient Display has ceased working. The "Lift to Wake" feature does not work at all and when I double tap on the screen I am sent straight to the lockscreen instead of the ambient mode activating.

I have already factory reset the phone as well as simply toggling the settings on and off.

Is there any other option to fix the bug or does it require a software update?
